## ThirdwebSDK.getSplitsContract() method

Get an instance of a Splits contract

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  address | string | the address of the deployed contract |

<b>Returns:</b>
